data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Acre, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Acre, Brazil

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Acre. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Acre, Brazil into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Acre, Brazil to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Papavo people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Papavo people.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Acre to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Acre.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Acre.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
